data.text: @stevebiddle Surprised it is so little. I was expecting far more.

@stevebiddle I'm bringing my nephew from MEL to AKL next week. That's $700 one way for 'works'.
He could fly with QF via Sydney for less than $600.

@stevebiddle @mattchannz I just won't pay that much in economy when business is not much more.
I'll pay $1500 return to MEL or SYD in J without an issue. Don't mind who I fly with.
@ItsSCT @mattchannz As much as I love flying on planes I'm not sold on spending half a day each way getting to and from Sydney via Auckland when I typically only go for a few days!
@stevebiddle Iâ€™m off next Tuesday for three weeks 🥳🥳
@stevebiddle @mattchannz LATAM has Business Class SIN-SYD on 787 for less than $1k return.
@stevebiddle You must surely still have 2 and a half RUs still waiting to be used.
@mattchannz No business class from Wellington! But to answer that question I may well fly via AKL on my birthday just to do that.
@stevebiddle What?! You're not booking business class?
